title: Chelsea v Benfica, Bodø/Glimt v Tottenham, and more: Champions League – live
summary: Stay tuned for the latest updates from a hectic night of European and Football League matches, as Yara El-Shaboury covers all the action and key moments. Catch the highlights and scores as they unfold. Don't miss out on any exciting developments in football!

title: Galatasaray v Liverpool: Champions League – live
summary: Scott Murray provides a live minute-by-minute update on the match between Turkish champions and Arne Slot's Reds in Istanbul. Fans can stay informed on the latest developments and key moments throughout the game. Tune in for real-time commentary and insights.

title: Trump says government shutdown likely as House Democrats call out Republicans for delaying votes before funding deadline – live
summary: Government funding is set to expire at midnight ET, creating a potential shutdown. Republican Speaker Mike Johnson delayed the House's return to limit Democratic negotiations. Tensions rise as the deadline approaches amid ongoing budget disputes.

title: Debut author Colwill Brown wins BBC short story award for ‘heartbreaking’ tale – read an extract here
summary: Brown's compelling narrative about a teenager's life profoundly altered by a single incident has been awarded the prestigious £15,000 prize. The story was chosen unanimously by the judges. Its emotional depth and resonance captivated the selection panel.

title: Uefa put Israel vote on hold due to Donald Trump’s proposed peace plan
summary: National federations that supported the ban on Maccabi Tel Aviv have agreed to pause it. This decision comes as Maccabi Tel Aviv prepares to compete against Dinamo Zagreb in the Europa League on Thursday. The federations are aligning their stance in light of the upcoming match.
